comment: idk what happened. I used to just keep scrolling for a while with endless pictures but now when scrolling the suggested images just end. also when I'm trying to look through all my boards alphabetically it'll just skip right back to where A starts. I can't even look at all my pins (like S or T) without it freaking out and scrolling back up to A. annoying.
scenarios: Scrolling through suggested images and noticing that the endless scrolling feature no longer works, causing the suggested images to end abruptly.
Trying to look through boards alphabetically, but the interface skips back to the beginning (A) when attempting to view items in the middle or end of the alphabet.
key sentence: Scrolling through suggested images and noticing that the endless scrolling feature no longer works, causing the suggested images to end abruptly.
